# OpenCL<sup>TM</sup> API Headers

This folder contains C language headers for the OpenCL API built from public
repository located at:

https://github.com/KhronosGroup/OpenCL-Headers


## Version

This folder contains OpenCL c headers release version v2025.07.22 which are
implementation of OpenCL v3.0.19 specification release.
